fields.headline: Man questioned over JonBenet murder
fields.bodyText: A man was being held in Thailand last night in connection with the murder in 1996 of JonBenet Ramsey the six-year-old beauty pageant contestant whose killing shocked the United States. An American arrested in Bangkok on unrelated sex charges knew details of the death that investigators had concealed from the public, according to media reports in Boulder, Colorado, where the family lived. Officials were quoted as saying he was a middle-aged teacher. Patsy and John Ramsey insisted an intruder killed their daughter, who was beaten and strangled.
